v8:item.v8:content: Group agreements through the EDF operator
Group of global command button for the exchange with the companies
Группа кнопок глобальных команд обмен между организациями
Global commands button group direct exchange
Группа кнопок глобальных команд прямой обмен
List of agreements with the counterparties

Settings.QueryText: SELECT Agreement.Ref, Agreement.Counterparty, "Partner" AS Partner, Agreement.CounterpartyContract, CASE WHEN Agreement.AgreementSetupExtendedMode THEN "Extended mode" ELSE Agreement.EDExchangeMethod END AS EDExchangeMethod, Agreement.Company, CASE WHEN Agreement.DeletionMark THEN VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMemberStatuses.EmptyRef) ELSE Agreement.ConnectionStatus END AS ConnectionStatus, CASE WHEN Agreement.DeletionMark THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.EmptyRef) ELSE Agreement.AgreementState END AS AgreementState, CAST(Agreement.Comment AS String(100)) AS Comment, Agreement.EDFProfileSettings FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS Agreement WHERE Not Agreement.IsIntercompany AND Agreement.EDExchangeMethod <> VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.QuickExchange) AND Agreement.EDExchangeMethod <> VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT Agreement.Ref, Agreement.Description, Agreement.Counterparty, Agreement.Company, CASE WHEN Agreement.DeletionMark THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.EmptyRef) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.Closed) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.Closed) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.Acts) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.Acts) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.NotAgreed) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.CoordinationExpected) END AS Status FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS Agreement WHERE Agreement.IsIntercompany

SELECT Agreement.Ref, Agreement.Description, Agreement.Counterparty AS Bank, Agreement.Company, CASE WHEN Agreement.DeletionMark THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.EmptyRef) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.Closed) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.Closed) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.Acts) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.Acts) WHEN Agreement.AgreementStatus = VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementsStatuses.NotAgreed) THEN VALUE(Enum.EDAgreementStates.CoordinationExpected) END AS State FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS Agreement WHERE Agreement.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource)

SELECT Agreement.Ref, Agreement.Counterparty, Agreement.Company, Agreement.AgreementState FROM Catalog.EDUsageAgreements AS Agreement, Constant.UseEDExchangeWithBanks AS UseEDExchangeWithBanks, Constant.UseEDExchangeBetweenCompanies AS UseEDExchangeBetweenCompanies WHERE CASE WHEN UseEDExchangeWithBanks.Value = FALSE THEN Not Agreement.EDExchangeMethod = VALUE(Enum.EDExchangeMethods.ThroughBankWebSource) ELSE TRUE END AND CASE WHEN UseEDExchangeBetweenCompanies.Value = FALSE THEN Not Agreement.IsIntercompany ELSE TRUE END

v8:item.v8:content: Open an item on 1C Buhphone service at ITS
Открыть статью на ИТС по сервису 1С-Бухфон
